MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 15-APR-2021 16:20.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the G43 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3.55pm to install fault finding equipment at Kintore substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.20pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.28pm on 15th April 2021.
